name: com.epicchain.unity-sdk
description: Comprehensive EpicChain blockchain SDK for Unity game developers. Enables seamless integration of blockchain functionality including wallet management, smart contract interaction, and NFT operations.

samples.description: Complete NFT marketplace with game integration showcasing EpicChain blockchain operations.
RPG game with blockchain-based items, achievements, and economic system.
Demonstrates wallet creation, management, and transaction operations in Unity.
